list_definition.mean_english: có mùi khó chịu, hôi thối
list_definition.definition: to have a very bad smell

list_ex_of_english: Does he not agree that this rising cry of stinking fish is somewhat discreditable?
I see no mention of the problem of stinking.
I know that many farmers go on to silage, but silage stinks and it is mucky.
I would hate to see our estuary become a stinking drain.
They are leaving that stinking and sinking ship so fast it is unbelievable.
I know the stinking miserable feeling in one's belly when one cannot provide the wherewithal for one's children.
If we were to hear it at all, we might have heard it, as it were, fresh instead of stinking.
